roleset.name: skate on ice
roleset.note: ICESKATE-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, relation to skate.01 . No VNcls. (from iceskate.01-v)

example.name: with LOC
example.text: Hard *PRO* to ice skate on water , ski when there 's no snow , or ice fish when there 's no ice !

example.name: with arg1, MNR
example.text: I just ice-skated home in my car on roads you can't see for the blowing snow (45 mph winds), went down a hill sideways and narrowly missed an oil tanker coming from the other direction.
example.arg: on roads you can't see for the blowing snow (45 mph winds)
